Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped with a finality counter. That creature becomes a Phyrexian artifact creature in addition to its other types. [i](If a creature with a finality counter on it would die, exile it instead.)[/i]
Basic landcycling {2} [i]({2}, Discard this card: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.)[/i]
